page.title: 01General view of study area
page.content: Our study area contains part of {Street,}much farmland and part of a small village called{Butleigh Wootton. In our part of Street there are two swimming pools, one indoor, one outdoor.We have a youth club, 5 schools, theatre, cinema, health centre, 4 churches but no hospital.We have 3 hotels. The river{Brue}runs through our study area. It is used for fishing, boating and swimming.There is also a{roller disco}for all ages.It is in the Crispin Hall.There is a market in Crispin Hall every Friday and Saturday. There is a wide selection of shops and newsagents in our study area.We have two dentists one is Mr. Hargreaves. We have quite a few parks, Merriman,Wraxhill and the Victoria park. Part of{Glastonbury}is in our study area.
